name: VENCORE, INC
sampleDescriptions: Presented ideas for technology improvements for the National Flood Insurance Program to House and Senate committee and Member staff.
Provided Intel Committees unclassified and classified overviews of contracts Vencore performs for intelligence agencies.
Met with House and Senate budget and appropriations staff to discuss importance of funding DOD and Intelligence programs in general.
Presented information to House and Senate staff on support Vencore provides to Dept of Homeland Security.
Briefed House and Senate Congressional offices, Space committees, and appropriations committees on Contracts Vencore perform for NASA and importance of fully funding.
